Mountains.english: 1. The majestic mountain peak stood tall against the clear blue sky.
Mountains.italian: La maestosa cima della montagna si ergeva alta contro il cielo azzurro
Mountains.spanish: La majestuosa cima de la montaña se alzaba imponente contra el cielo azul
Mountains.german: Der majestätische Berggipfel ragte hoch in den klaren blauen Himmel.

Mountains.english: 2. The fresh mountain air invigorated our spirits.
Mountains.italian: L'aria fresca di montagna ha rinvigorito i nostri spiriti
Mountains.spanish: El aire fresco de la montaña revitalizó nuestros espíritus
Mountains.german: Die frische Bergluft belebte unsere Geister.

Mountains.english: 3. We hiked through the dense forest to reach the mountain summit.
Mountains.italian: Abbiamo camminato attraverso la fitta foresta per raggiungere la vetta della montagna
Mountains.spanish: Caminamos a través del denso bosque para llegar a la cumbre de la montaña
Mountains.german: Wir wanderten durch den dichten Wald, um den Gipfel des Berges zu erreichen.

Mountains.english: 4. The snow-capped mountain peaks glistened under the morning sun.
Mountains.italian: Le vette delle montagne coperte di neve luccicavano sotto il sole del mattino
Mountains.spanish: Las cumbres de las montañas cubiertas de nieve brillaban bajo el sol de la mañana
Mountains.german: Die schneebedeckten Berggipfel glänzten unter der Morgensonne.

Mountains.english: 5. From the mountaintop, we enjoyed a breathtaking view of the valley below.
Mountains.italian: Dalla cima della montagna, abbiamo goduto di una vista mozzafiato della valle sottostante
Mountains.spanish: Desde la cima de la montaña, disfrutamos de una vista impresionante del valle de abajo
Mountains.german: Vom Gipfel aus genossen wir einen atemberaubenden Blick auf das Tal unten.

Mountains.english: 6. Mountain climbers face numerous challenges and risks.
Mountains.italian: Gli alpinisti affrontano numerose sfide e rischi
Mountains.spanish: Los montañistas enfrentan numerosos desafíos y riesgos
Mountains.german: Bergsteiger stehen vor zahlreichen Herausforderungen und Risiken.

Mountains.english: 7. The mountain range stretched as far as the eye could see.
Mountains.italian: La catena montuosa si estendeva fin dove l'occhio poteva vedere
Mountains.spanish: La cordillera se extendía hasta donde alcanzaba la vista
Mountains.german: Das Gebirge erstreckte sich so weit das Auge reichte.

Mountains.english: 8. Mountain streams flowed gently through the lush green valleys.
Mountains.italian: I ruscelli di montagna scorrevano dolcemente attraverso le valli verdi e rigogliose
Mountains.spanish: Los arroyos de montaña fluían suavemente por los verdes valles
Mountains.german: Bergbäche flossen sanft durch die üppig grünen Täler.

Mountains.english: 9. The mountain village was nestled amidst picturesque landscapes.
Mountains.italian: Il villaggio di montagna era incastonato in un paesaggio pittoresco
Mountains.spanish: El pueblo de montaña se encontraba entre paisajes pintorescos
Mountains.german: Das Bergdorf lag eingebettet in malerischer Landschaft.

Mountains.english: 10. The rugged mountain terrain challenged our hiking skills.
Mountains.italian: Il terreno montuoso e accidentato ha messo alla prova le nostre abilità di escursionismo
Mountains.spanish: El terreno montañoso y accidentado desafió nuestras habilidades para caminar
Mountains.german: Das raue Berggelände stellte unsere Wanderfähigkeiten auf die Probe.

Mountains.english: 11. Mountain climbers require proper equipment and training.
Mountains.italian: Gli alpinisti richiedono equipaggiamento e addestramento adeguati
Mountains.spanish: Los montañistas requieren equipo y entrenamiento adecuados
Mountains.german: Bergsteiger benötigen angemessene Ausrüstung und Training.

Mountains.english: 12. The mountain range is home to a diverse range of wildlife.
Mountains.italian: La catena montuosa è casa di una vasta gamma di fauna selvatica
Mountains.spanish: La cordillera alberga una diversa gama de vida silvestre
Mountains.german: Das Gebirge beherbergt eine vielfältige Tierwelt.

Mountains.english: 13. The mountain path led us to a hidden waterfall.
Mountains.italian: Il sentiero di montagna ci ha condotto a una cascata nascosta
Mountains.spanish: El camino de montaña nos llevó a una cascada escondida
Mountains.german: Der Bergpfad führte uns zu einem versteckten Wasserfall.

Mountains.english: 14. Mountain climbers must be prepared for sudden weather changes.
Mountains.italian: Gli alpinisti devono essere preparati per improvvisi cambiamenti del tempo
Mountains.spanish: Los montañistas deben estar preparados para cambios repentinos en el clima
Mountains.german: Bergsteiger müssen auf plötzliche Wetteränderungen vorbereitet sein.

Mountains.english: 15. The mountain range is a popular destination for avid hikers.
Mountains.italian: La catena montuosa è una meta popolare per gli appassionati di escursionismo
Mountains.spanish: La cordillera es un destino popular para los excursionistas ávidos
Mountains.german: Das Gebirge ist ein beliebtes Ziel für begeisterte Wanderer.

Mountains.english: 16. We set up camp near a crystal-clear mountain lake.
Mountains.italian: Abbiamo montato il campo vicino a un lago di montagna cristallino
Mountains.spanish: Acampamos cerca de un lago de montaña cristalino
Mountains.german: Wir schlugen unser Lager nahe einem kristallklaren Bergsee auf.

Mountains.english: 17. The mountain range is known for its challenging rock-climbing routes.
Mountains.italian: La catena montuosa è conosciuta per le sue sfide di arrampicata su roccia
Mountains.spanish: La cordillera es conocida por sus desafiantes rutas de escalada en roca
Mountains.german: Das Gebirge ist bekannt für seine anspruchsvollen Kletterrouten.

Mountains.english: 18. We hiked through the mountain meadows, enjoying the colorful wildflowers.
Mountains.italian: Abbiamo camminato attraverso i prati di montagna, godendoci i colorati fiori selvatici
Mountains.spanish: Caminamos por los prados de montaña, disfrutando de las coloridas flores silvestres
Mountains.german: Wir wanderten durch die Bergwiesen und genossen die bunten Wildblumen.

Mountains.english: 19. The mountain range is a source of inspiration for many artists.
Mountains.italian: La catena montuosa è una fonte di ispirazione per molti artisti
Mountains.spanish: La cordillera es una fuente de inspiración para muchos artistas
Mountains.german: Das Gebirge ist eine Inspirationsquelle für viele Künstler.

Mountains.english: 20. The mountain peak was covered in a thick blanket of snow.
Mountains.italian: La cima della montagna era coperta da un denso manto di neve
Mountains.spanish: La cumbre de la montaña estaba cubierta por una gruesa capa de nieve
Mountains.german: Der Berggipfel war mit einer dicken Schneedecke bedeckt.
